Name: Ernest Haycox
Notability: Writer of Western fiction ; his story Stage to Lordsburg was made into the 1939 movie Stagecoach

Name: George Hitchcock
Notability: Poet and publisher of the literary journal Kayak

Name: Ken Kesey
Notability: Author of One Flew Over the Cuckoo 's Nest and Sometimes a Great Notion

Name: Chang-Rae Lee
Notability: Novelist , Native Speaker ; director of Princeton University 's Creative Writing program

Name: Chuck Palahniuk
Notability: Author of Fight Club , Choke , and Lullaby

Name: David Reiter
Notability: Author and poet : 1994 Queensland Premier 's Poetry Award , The Cave After Saltwater Tide - winner , 2012 Western Australian Premier 's Award , My Planets Reunion Memoir - winner , 2013 Canadian Children 's Book Centre Best Book for Teens and Kids , Bringing Down the Wall - winner
